backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister entry point.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the home page routing configuration has been implemented in App.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the routing setup, page components, header/footer, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Duplicate of frontend/src/index.css containing Tailwind directives and OKLCH color system CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx, titled 'Set home page as default route'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining root layout with Header/Footer and two routes: home page at '/' and project details at '/project-details'.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with brand info, quick links, social icons, copyright notice, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with ProjectHub logo, navigation buttons for Home and Projects routes, and active route highlighting using TanStack Router state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using @dfinity/auth-client for login, logout, and identity management with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Example React Query hook template using useActor for backend data fetching, currently returning null as a placeholder.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark mode theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point wrapping App with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: React component rendering the home page with hero section, three feature cards (Intuitive Design, Lightning Fast, Goal Focused), and a call-to-action section with navigation to project details.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDetailsPage.ts: React component displaying a list of sample projects in a card grid layout with status badges, team size, deadlines, and navigation back to home page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings for borders/radius/animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata indicating a fix request to change the default route from project page to home page, with existing routing feature and pending action item AR-1.
